alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Irwin; Tift; Turner (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 9:47PM EDT until September 07 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Irwin County in south central Georgia... North central Berrien County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Turner County in south central Georgia... Northern Tift County in south central Georgia... Ben Hill County in south central Georgia... * Until 1030 PM EDT. * At 947 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Rhine to near Mystic to 8 miles northeast of Ty Ty, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ocilla, Tifton, Enigma, Mystic, Chula, Lulaville, Gladys, Osierfield, Harding, Waterloo, Pinetta, Ashton, Irwinville, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Wray, Bowens Mill, Red Bluff, Queensland, and Sunsweet. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Ben Hill; Berrien; Irwin; Tift; Turner
